datatType.name: Current Time
datatType.description:
This datatype provides a java object containing the time and date of its creation. the validity is one second. The datatype is modeled after JodaTime Class DateTime but does not provide the methods to compare or change the data, only to retreive it.
It provides acces to the time as a String formated yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss as well as access to an XML-representation and a json representation.
